titles.title: 755 A Virgin Chaste How Fair to View (easy sweet t

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
A virgin chaste how fair to view
The saints so loved to Thee kept true
And spotless all the journey through
Espoused to Thee alone

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
With holy gems of wondrous worth
And robes whose beauty not of earth
Invests a bride of heavenly birth
Adorned for Thee alone

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Borne as a seal Thy love's delight
Upon Thine heart and arm of might
Led onward in a path of light
Sustained by Thee alone

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
The Spirit's charge a heavenly Guide
Directs the journey of the bride
Each movement on the desert wide
Controlled for Thee alone

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Enraptured with her glorious Head
Her feet with haste the pathway tread
Her heart to every rival dead
Possessed by Thee alone

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
With strength of heart to cherish Thee
With breadth of mind Thy thoughts to see
With every bridal quality
Endowed for Thee alone

verse.name: v7
verse.lines:
In holy robes in beauty rare
The fruit of loves unceasing care
The bride shall soon be greeted there
Presented Thine alone
